title: John Kenneth Galbraith
summary: John Kenneth Galbraith[lower-alpha 1] OC (October 15, 1908 â€“ April 29, 2006), also known as Ken Galbraith, was a Canadian-American economist, diplomat, public official and intellectual. His books on economic topics were bestsellers from the 1950s through the 2000s. As an economist, he leaned toward post-Keynesian economics from an institutionalist perspective.[1][2]
